summary: The module defines a dataset class that manages the acquisition, caching, preprocessing, and optional transformation of the Yelp graph dataset, delivering a DGL graph equipped with node features, multi‑class labels, and train/validation/test masks for node classification.
business_intent: To supply researchers and developers with an easy‑to‑use, ready‑made Yelp network dataset for training and evaluating graph neural network models on node classification tasks.
